name: auth-gist
description: Gist of an authorisation server, based on express-oauth-server.

scripts.start-dev: yarn && yarn pre-build && yarn && yarn tsc && nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.pipeline-test: yarn && yarn tsc && rm -rf dist/sm-auth/__tests__ && jest --coverage --passWithNoTests
scripts.create-db-migration: yarn pre-build && yarn && db-migrate create ${1} --sql-file -m ./src/data/migrations -e all --config ./config/db/config.json
scripts.run-all-migrations: yarn pre-build && yarn && db-migrate up -m src/data/migrations -e all --config config/db/config.json
